Package gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.gui.MainFragments

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BabRuleFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses BabRuleRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured BabRules
    BcbRuleFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses BcbRuleRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured BcbRules
    BibRuleFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses BibRuleRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured BibRules
    ConfigurationFragment
    Base class for all configuration/status fragments used in IonDTN Modifies behaviour including update routines when the ION status changed
    ConfigurationListFragment
    Fragment class that uses an RecyclerView to provide an configuration option for a certain ION object.
    ContactFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses ContactRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured contacts
    EndpointFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses EndpointRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured endpoints
    InductFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses InductRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured inducts
    InOutductFragment
    A Fragment that provides a tab design for both the InductFragment and the OutductFragment.
    KeyFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses KeyRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured keys
    OutductFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses OutductRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured outducts
    ProtocolFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses ProtocolRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured protocols
    RangeFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses RangeRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured ranges
    SchemeFragment
    List Configuration Fragment that uses SchemeRecyclerViewAdapter to display all configured schemes
    SecurityFragment
    A Fragment that provides a tab design for the BabRuleFragment, the BibRuleFragment, the BcbRuleFragment and the KeyFragment.
    StatusFragment
    Fragment that handles the lifecycle of ION Allows starting and stopping and has a log output element to review the ION operations
